description:
Collect inventory data and metrics of your hosts and sends it to the New Relic platform.


What's Changed
- chore(deps): update dependency newrelic/nri-prometheus to v2.27.2 https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2130
- Added support for Suse 15.7 OS upgrade in https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2139
- chore(deps): update dependency newrelic/nri-winservices to v1.4.0https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2143
- Add support for debian 13 in https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2140
Full Changelog: https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/compare/1.70.0...1.71.0
